document.full_text: japan's fractious ruling party resumed its bickering friday after prime minister naoto kan hinted he wanted to keep his job into the new year, angering rivals who had voted down a no-confidence motion in return for a promise he would quit much sooner.
document.title: japan ruling party resumes bickering over when pm to quit
lines_and_colors: japan's fractious ruling party resumed its bickering friday after prime minister naoto kan hinted he wanted to keep his job into the new year, angering rivals who had voted down a no-confidence motion in return for a promise he would quit much sooner.
